- [ ] Automation

- [ ] Documentation

Description
-----------



My PR...
--------
- [ ] Passes tests
- [ ] Maintains and/or adds tests
- [ ] Keeps documentation up to date
- [ ] Contains clean code that's mostly SOLID
- [ ] Is fully backwards compatible or upgrades major version where it can't be
